books.author: by Delia Owens
books.description: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.
books.name: WHERE THE CRAWDADS SING

books.author: by James Rollins
books.description: Monk Kokkalis and Commander Gray Pierce use arcane clues in hopes of preventing a potential apocalypse.
books.name: CRUCIBLE

books.author: by Heather Morris
books.description: A concentration camp detainee tasked with permanently marking fellow prisoners falls in love with one of them.
books.name: THE TATTOOIST OF AUSCHWITZ

books.author: by Jill Shalvis
books.description: The seventh book in the Heartbreaker Bay series. A tattoo artist and a mogul are forced to face their undeniable chemistry.
books.name: PLAYING FOR KEEPS

books.author: by Greer Hendricks and Sarah Pekkanen
books.description: Jessica Farris’s life unravels when she signs up for Dr. Shields’s psychology study.
books.name: AN ANONYMOUS GIRL

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A decorated World War II veteran shoots and kills a pastor inside a Mississippi church.
books.name: THE RECKONING

books.author: by Alan Bradley
books.description: Flavia de Luce, a 12-year-old detective, is on the case when a human finger ends up in her sister’s wedding cake.
books.name: THE GOLDEN TRESSES OF THE DEAD

books.author: by John Lescroart
books.description: Dismas Hardy must solve a mystery involving his secretary, who is arrested for abetting a murder.
books.name: THE RULE OF LAW

books.author: by Ken Follett
books.description: The fate of a German aristocrat and spy known as the Needle relies on the loyalty of an Englishwoman.
books.name: EYE OF THE NEEDLE

books.author: by Vi Keeland
books.description: Love and hate bring a potential office romance to a boil.
books.name: WE SHOULDN'T

books.author: by James Patterson and Candice Fox
books.description: Detective Harriet Blue has become a dangerous fugitive from the law as she pursues the murderer Regan Banks.
books.name: LIAR LIAR

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: Four American trauma doctors face difficult choices when they join a mass-casualty training program in Paris.
books.name: TURNING POINT

books.author: by Gail Honeyman
books.description: A young woman’s well-ordered life is disrupted by the I.T. guy from her office.
books.name: ELEANOR OLIPHANT IS COMPLETELY FINE

books.author: by Tayari Jones
books.description: A newlywed couple's relationship is tested when the husband is sentenced to 12 years in prison.
books.name: AN AMERICAN MARRIAGE

books.author: by Deborah Harkness
books.description: The recovery of a lost ancient manuscript in a library at Oxford sets a fantastical underworld stirring.
books.name: A DISCOVERY OF WITCHES
